name: Sockhead: We are real
description:
Sockhead is a 2D Platformer with a dark, shadowy aesthetic and secondary challenges based on exploration, where around 50% of the level is hidden. ¿Will you be able to find the 6 hearts?

"We are real" is a pilot level, originaly developed as a prototype. Based on feedback, I will design and implement the features that work best for the project, including new mechanics, enemies and secondary tasks.

Controls:

Move with A-D or arrow keys

Jump with Spacebar

Use objects with F

Climb ladders with W

Reload last checkpoint with R
